bibl.title: Adolph Krug vs. The United States of America. Order
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: Circuit Court of the United States

div1.ab: IN THE CIRCUIT COURT OF THE UNITED STATES, DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON, NORTHERN DIVISION.
In the Matter of the APPLICATION OF ADOLPH KRUG FOR WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS AND RELEASE, and other proceedings thereon.
div1.p: Now on this 15th day of February, 1897, on reading and filing the petition of Adolph Krug, for a Writ of Habeas Corpus, it is hereby ordered that the application contained in said petition, for a Writ of Habeas Corpus, be and the same is hereby set for hearing in the court room of this court, in the City of Seattle, on the 25th day of February, 1897, at the hour of ten (10) o'clock A.M., and that William H. Moyer, sheriff of King County, do then and there appear and show cause, if he can, why said Writ of Habeas Corpus should not be issued.
div1.ab: IN THE Circuit COURT OF THE UNITED STATES FOR THE DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON
In the Matter of the Petition of Adolph Krug Writ of Habeas Corpus
Filed Feby 15 1897 A Reeves Ayres Clerk.
